detectors.description:
Vault.setSecurityGuard(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- securityGuard = _newSecurityGuard ()

Escapable.changeEscapeCaller(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- escapeHatchCaller = _newEscapeHatchCaller ()

Vault.setTimelock(uint256) () should emit an event for: 
	- timeLock = _newTimeLock ()

Owned.changeOwner(address)._newOwner () lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = _newOwner ()

Vault.collectAuthorizedPayment(uint256) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now < p.earliestPayTime ()
detectors.markdown:
[Vault.collectAuthorizedPayment(uint256)]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [now < p.earliestPayTime]()

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected THROW ():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [THROW]():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

detectors.description: solc-0.4.6 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.6 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Parameter Owned.changeOwner(address)._newOwner () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Vault.cancelPayment(uint256)._idPayment () is not in mixedCase
Parameter Vault.setTimelock(uint256)._newTimeLock () is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in Vault.collectAuthorizedPayment(uint256) ():
	External calls:
	- ! p.recipient.send(p.amount) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- PaymentExecuted(_idPayment,p.recipient,p.amount) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Vault.collectAuthorizedPayment(uint256)]():
	External calls:
	- [! p.recipient.send(p.amount)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [PaymentExecuted(_idPayment,p.recipient,p.amount)]()

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Escapable.escapeHatch() ():
	External calls:
	- ! escapeHatchDestination.send(total) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- EscapeHatchCalled(total) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Escapable.escapeHatch()]():
	External calls:
	- [! escapeHatchDestination.send(total)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [EscapeHatchCalled(total)]()
